<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Doctrine of Blissful Eternity](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1798)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 178</row>

**Price** 340 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Characters from Geb have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The bones of small animals decorate the cover of this tome, creating a pattern that resembles a gross perversion of [Pharasma's](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) holy symbol.
